creators.name: Linke, David
creators.affiliation: Leibniz Institute for Catalysis, Albert-Einstein-Str. 29 A, 18059 Rostock, Germany

description:
DCAT-AP+ is a domain-agnostic metadata schema build as extension of the DCAT Application Profile for providing links to use-case specific context. It allows to provide additional metadata regarding: which kind(s) of entity(s) or activity(s) were evaluated (the dcat:Dataset is about), which kind of activity generated the dcat:Dataset, which kind of instruments were used in the dataset generating activity, in which surrounding (e.g. a laboratory) and according to which plan the dataset generating activity took place, as well as regarding which kind(s) of qualitative and quantitative characteristic were attributed to the evaluated entity or evaluated activity and to the used instruments.

The metadata schema is developend as LinkML model which allows to generate various artefacts such as JSON-Schema, SHACL shapes, Python-bindings, and documentation.
